body:
Hello @jbrockmendel! Thanks for updating the PR.

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/core/arrays/datetimelike.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/533ab473011d9321ded8d1ccc5cb5121b2962d4d/pandas/core/arrays/datetimelike.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/core/arrays/period.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/533ab473011d9321ded8d1ccc5cb5121b2962d4d/pandas/core/arrays/period.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/core/indexes/period.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/533ab473011d9321ded8d1ccc5cb5121b2962d4d/pandas/core/indexes/period.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/arithmetic/test_period.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/533ab473011d9321ded8d1ccc5cb5121b2962d4d/pandas/tests/arithmetic/test_period.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/indexes/period/test_indexing.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/533ab473011d9321ded8d1ccc5cb5121b2962d4d/pandas/tests/indexes/period/test_indexing.py) !



##### Comment last updated on December 14, 2018 at 22:23 Hours UTC

Perhaps hold off on this for #24024, which is changing (some) of these to use `_check_compatiable_with`.

I suppose that would be a relatively easy fix to split off from #24024, and it'd mean fewer changes here as well.

> I suppose that would be a relatively easy fix to split off from #24024, and it'd mean fewer changes here as well.

+1

I can take care of that if you like.

On Fri, Dec 14, 2018 at 2:17 PM jbrockmendel <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> I suppose that would be a relatively easy fix to split off from #24024
> <https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/24024>, and it'd mean fewer
> changes here as well.
>
> +1
